    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">I Used to… 2</string>
            <string language="en">I Used to ... 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich verwendete... 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">J'ai utilisé... 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu usei... 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ho usato... 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίησα... 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Utilicé... 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Do you know how to use “I used to…” + a verb, and the present simple of the verb? This is what you get to practise here. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Do you know how to use "I used to ..." + a verb, and the present simple of the verb? This is what you get Thursday practice here. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">used to</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>
            <string language="sv">present simple</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">used to</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
            <string language="en">present simple</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie, "mich verwenden..." + ein Verb 
verwendete und das Geschenk einfach vom Verb? Dieses ist, was 
Sie Donnerstag Praxis hier erhalten. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savez-vous m'utiliser "a utilisé..." + un verbe,
et le présent simple du verbe ? Est ce ce que vous obtenez à 
pratique en matière de jeudi ici. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour des débutants - module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você sabe me usar "se usou..." + um verbo, e o 
presente simples do verbo? Este é o que você começa a 
prática de quinta-feira aqui. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sapete usarlo "ha usato..." + un verbo ed il 
presente semplice del verbo? Ciò è che cosa ottenete a pratica
di giovedì qui. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέρετε πώς να χρησιμοποιήσετε "εγώ 
χρησιμοποιήσατε..." + ένα ρήμα, και το παρόν απλό του 
ρήματος; Αυτό είναι τι παίρνετε την πρακτική Πέμπτης εδώ.
Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους 
αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted sabe utilizarme "utilizó..." + un verbo, 
y el presente simple del verbo? Esto es lo que usted consigue a 
práctica de jueves aquí. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para 
los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
